properties.name: The Salvation Army Corps
properties.Desc:
Daily soup kitchen
and 58-room emergency
shelter, open Mon-Sat
10am-5:30pm

properties.name: The Haven Day Shelter
properties.Desc:
Daily breakfast, showers,
laundry, mail, and
computer access
6:30am-12pm and 1-5 pm

properties.name: Emergency Food Network
properties.Desc:
Food pantry requiring call-ahead
from 9am-12pm for
pickup from 1:30-3:30pm
(Mondays and Fridays)
(434) 979-9180
